content.body: Next TG5 meeting will be held on **Wednesday 30th of October**. Agenda: https://github.com/tc39/tg5/blob/main/agendas/2024/2024-10-30.md . _Please note the unusual meeting times due to the fact that the U.S. and Europe switch from the Daylight Saving Time on different dates._
content.formatted_body: Next TG5 meeting will be held on Wednesday 30th of October. Agenda: https://github.com/tc39/tg5/blob/main/agendas/2024/2024-10-30.md . Please note the unusual meeting times due to the fact that the U.S. and Europe switch from the Daylight Saving Time on different dates.
